thread.title: The Art of Burning Man, Without the Burn

author: Alexandra Wolfe
title: The Art of Burning Man, Without the Burn
text:
Want to experience Burning Man without the Nevada desert? Starting March 30, visitors to the Renwick Gallery of the Smithsonian American Art Museum in Washington, D.C., can view actual and reimagined works from the event. Part of the show is inside the museum, the rest is outdoors, across the neighborhood. Some of the art is interactive, such as a wooden temple where visitors can leave notes. “It’s really trying to break out of the box of being a museum where people just come in and look,” says curator Nora Atkinson.
